Key Features

  • 📈

    Enhance Decision Making

    Receive easy to understand AI-generated insights and recommendations to increase Google Ads ROAS.
  • 🔎

    Optimize Ad Performance

    Easily compare and evaluate the performance of your ads to pinpoint what's working and where to improve, enhancing ad effectiveness and reach.
  • 📊

    Automate Reporting and Anomaly Detection

    Get automated reports on your ad performance, and receive alerts on your key Google Ads metrics.

AI-powered insights and Automated Google Ads Reporting

AI Narratives app transforms your Google Ads data into actionable natural language insights. With a seamless connection, you’ll receive a comprehensive view of your ad performance, enabling data-driven decisions that lead to more successful campaigns.
Get AI-generated Insights:
• Simply connect your Google Ads account and get first insights in minutes.
• Ad Performance insights. Easily compare the performance of your ads, uncovering valuable insights to optimize your advertising campaigns.
• GPT insights. Get detailed weekly and monthly recommendations deivered in natural language.
Receive automated reports:
• Scheduled reports: Receive daily, weekly, or monthly reports in your inbox to save time and ensure consistency.
• Running several campaigns at once? Connect multiple Google Ads sources and generate reports for various campaigns.
Stay notified of any changes:
Anomaly detection: Get alerts on unusual patterns or sudden changes in your ad metrics so you can act quickly.
Connect your data in minutes and start seeing actionable insights today.

Show more
